name: isa-l_crypto
description: Node.js bindings for the Intel(R) Intelligent Storage Acceleration Library Crypto Version

scripts.clean: git clean -xfd && git submodule foreach --recursive git clean -xfd && git submodule foreach --recursive git reset --hard && git submodule update --init --recursive
scripts.coverage: node test -c && c8 report --reporter=html && gcovr -r src --html --html-details -o coverage/native.html --object-directory $(pwd)/build/Release/obj.target/isal_crypto/src || true

author: Gabriel Schulhof <gabriel.schulhof@intel.com>
